Get the title of dataset's columns

Source: R/get_column_title.R
get_column_title.Rd

Get the title of dataset's columns

get_column_title(dataset = NULL)

Arguments

dataset

an INSEE's dataset, if NULL

Value

a dataframe

Examples

# \donttest{
column_titles_all_dataset = get_column_title()
